title: The Who - It's Hard (1982/2015) 24-bit/96 kHz HDTracks
description:
The Who - It's Hard (1982/2015)
 FLAC (tracks) 24-bit/96 kHz | Time - 69:46 minutes | 1,53 GB
Studio Master, Official Digital Download | Artwork: Front cover

 Released in 1982, It's Hard is the tenth studio album by The Who. It was also the last album to include bassist John Entwistle and drummer Kenney Jones, and reached #11 in the UK and #8 in the US upon its release.


 Driven by Pete Townshend's arching musical ambitions, It's Hard was an undistinguished final effort from the Who. Featuring layers of synthesizers and long-winded, twisting song structures, the album featured few memorable melodies and little energy, with only the anthemic "Athena" and the terse "Eminence Front" making a lasting impression.
